description.value:
The bulwark breathes a 60- foot cone of green gas. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save. The bulwark can't use Serpentstone Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Serpentstone Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature's body hardens, causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature becomes petrified for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns.

Critical Failure The creature becomes petrified permanently.
